alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 5:14PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Brevard County through 600 PM EDT... At 514 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Haulover Canal. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Playalinda Beach, Haulover Canal, Mims, Klondike Beach and Shiloh. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Coastal Volusia; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands
